bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, CNC'D hollow box section BB, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system 130m travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots
